articles.content: I inadvertently took a month-long break from Animal Crossing: New Horizons, the longest I've gone without collecting Bells and bugs since before the game was released in late March. Upon my return to… [+4406 chars]

articles.author: Alissa McAloon
articles.title: Unreal Engine devs can now capture facial animation using an iOS app - Gamasutra
articles.description: Epic Games has launched a new iOS app that uses the platform's ARKit technology to capture real-world facial movements and translate those to character models in Unreal Engine.
articles.content:
Epic Games has launched a new iOS app that uses the platform’s ARKit technology to capture real-world facial movements and translate those to character models in Unreal Engine.
